Metadata.title: Receipt Vault

Dashboard.subtitle: Here is an overview of your receipts and spending.

EmptyState.welcomeMessage: Upload your first receipt to start tracking your spending and gain insights into your shopping habits.
EmptyState.noReceiptsMessage: Upload your first receipt to get started
EmptyState.noDataMessage: Upload receipts to see your spending analysis.

Upload.title: Upload receipt
Upload.subtitle: Take a photo of your receipt or select a file from your device.
Upload.orSelectFile: or select a file from your device
Upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC
Upload.onlyImagesAllowed: Only images (JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC) are allowed
Upload.tip2: Keep the receipt flat and without folds
Upload.tip3: Make sure all text is visible and readable
Upload.tip4: Take the photo from directly above for best results

ReceiptDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this receipt?
